title: Iron Shot
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|Hurls a large and heavy metal shot.}} {{AttackSpell |name=Iron Shot |formula = 9d(1.66+Power/12) |maxdmg = 9d19 |maxsp = 200 |range = 4 |target = Beam |tohit = 7+Power/15 |special = N/A |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 7 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 15 |dam_calculator = calcdice |dam_numdice = 9 |dam_adder = 15 |dam_num = 3 |dam_denom = 4}} '''Iron Shot''' is a monster-only spell which launches a metal lance at a single target. It has only modest range, can be blocked or dodged away from, but deals heavy irresistible damage to whatever it hits. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{Spell |name=Iron Shot |level=6 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Earth Magic}} |sources=
[[Book of Power]]
[[Book of Iron]]
|castingnoise=6 |spellnoise=6 |power cap=200 |range=4 |flags=Dir or target, Needs tracer}} *Prior to [[0.31]], Iron Shot was a level 6 [[Conjurations]]/[[Earth]] spell available to players. It functioned similarly to [[Bombard]], but did more damage and did not knock the player back. *Iron Shot was formerly named '''Bolt of Iron''', and then '''Iron Bolt''', but was renamed once more in [[0.6]] due to the fact that it did not function like the other [[Bolt spells]].
